verses.verse: מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- Oh יִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> yit-Ten Oh that רֹאשִׁי֙ <WH7218> ro-Shi my head מַ֔יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim, were waters וְעֵינִ֖י <WH5869> ve-'ei-Ni and mine eyes מְק֣וֹר <WH4726> me-Kor a fountain דִּמְעָ֑ה <WH1832> dim-'Ah; of tears וְאֶבְכֶּה֙ <WH1058> ve-'ev-Keh that I might weep יוֹמָ֣ם <WH3119> yo-Mam day וָלַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> va-Lay-lah, and night אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et חַֽלְלֵ֥י <WH2491> chal-Lei for the slain בַת־ <WH1323> vat- of the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> 'am-Mi. of my people

מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- Oh יִתְּנֵ֣נִי <WH5414> yit-te-Ne-ni Oh that בַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> vam-mid-Bar, I had in the wilderness מְלוֹן֙ <WH4411> me-lOn a lodging place אֹֽרְחִ֔ים <WH732> 'o-re-Chim, of wayfaring men וְאֶֽעֶזְבָה֙ <WH5800> ve-'e-'ez-Vah that I might leave אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> 'am-Mi, my people וְאֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> ve-'e-le-Chah and go מֵֽאִתָּ֑ם <WH853> me-'it-Tam; כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki them כֻלָּם֙ <WH3605> chul-Lam for all מְנָ֣אֲפִ֔ים <WH5003> me-Na-'a-Fim, from them for they [be] all adulterers עֲצֶ֖רֶת <WH6116> 'a-Tze-ret an assembly בֹּגְדִֽים׃ <WH898> bo-ge-Dim. of treacherous men

וַֽיַּדְרְכ֤וּ <WH1869> vai-yad-re-Chu And they bend אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- לְשׁוֹנָם֙ <WH3956> le-sho-Nam their tongues קַשְׁתָּ֣ם <WH7198> kash-Tam [like] their bow שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> She-ker, [for] lies וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo and not לֶאֱמוּנָ֖ה <WH530> le-'e-mu-Nah for the truth גָּבְר֣וּ <WH1396> ga-ve-Ru but they are not valiant בָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> va-'A-retz; upon the earth כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki from מֵרָעָ֨ה <WH7451> me-ra-'Ah from evil אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to רָעָ֧ה׀ <WH7451> ra-'Ah to evil יָצָ֛אוּ <WH3318> ya-Tza-'u for they proceed וְאֹתִ֥י <WH853> ve-'o-Ti לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not יָדָ֖עוּ <WH3045> ya-Da-'u and they know נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- not me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every one מֵרֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7453> me-re-'E-hu of his neighbour הִשָּׁמֵ֔רוּ <WH8104> hish-sha-Me-ru, Take ye heed וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any אָ֖ח <WH251> 'ach ye not in any brother אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּבְטָ֑חוּ <WH982> tiv-Ta-chu; and trust כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki Because כָל־ <WH3605> chol every אָח֙ <WH251> 'ach for every brother עָק֣וֹב <WH6117> a-Kov will utterly יַעְקֹ֔ב <WH6117> ya'-Ko, supplant וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and every רֵ֖עַ <WH7453> Re-a' and every neighbour רָכִ֥יל <WH7400> ra-Chil with slanders יַהֲלֹֽךְ׃ <WH1980> ya-ha-Loch. will walk

וְאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> ve-'Ish every one בְּרֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7453> be-re-'E-hu his neighbour יְהָתֵ֔לּוּ <WH2048> ye-ha-Tel-lu, And they will deceive וֶאֱמֶ֖ת <WH571> ve-'e-Met the truth לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo and does not יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <WH1696> ye-dab-Be-ru; and will not speak לִמְּד֧וּ <WH3925> lim-me-Du they have taught לְשׁוֹנָ֛ם <WH3956> le-sho-Nam their tongue דַּבֶּר־ <WH1696> dab-ber- to speak שֶׁ֖קֶר <WH8267> She-ker lies הַעֲוֵ֥ה <WH5753> ha-'a-Veh themselves to commit iniquity נִלְאֽוּ׃ <WH3811> nil-'U. [and] weary

שִׁבְתְּךָ֖ <WH3427> shiv-te-Cha Thine habitation בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch [is] in the midst מִרְמָ֑ה <WH4820> mir-Mah; of deceit בְּמִרְמָ֛ה <WH4820> be-mir-Mah through deceit מֵאֲנ֥וּ <WH3985> me-'a-Nu they refuse דַֽעַת־ <WH3045> da-'at- to know אוֹתִ֖י <WH853> o-Ti נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot, of hosts הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold צוֹרְפָ֖ם <WH6884> tzor-Fam Behold I will melt וּבְחַנְתִּ֑ים <WH974> u-ve-chan-Tim; them and try כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For אֵ֣יךְ <WH349> 'eich what אֶעֱשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> 'e-'e-Seh, them for how shall I do מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei for בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> 'am-Mi. folk

חֵ֥ץ <WH2671> chetz [is as] an arrow; שֹׁוחֵט sho-chet כשָׁח֛וּט <WH7819> sha-Chut kill קלְשׁוֹנָ֖ם <WH3956> le-sho-Nam Their tongue מִרְמָ֣ה <WH4820> mir-Mah deceit דִבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> dib-Ber; it speaketh בְּפִ֗יו <WH6310> be-Fiv, with his mouth שָׁל֤וֹם <WH7965> sha-Lom peaceably אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- for רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7453> re-'E-hu to his neighbour יְדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> ye-dab-Ber, [one] speaketh וּבְקִרְבּ֖וֹ <WH7130> u-ve-kir-Bo but in heart יָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> ya-Sim he layeth אָרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH696> a-re-Bo. his wait

הַעַל־ <WH5921> ha-'al- for אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not אֶפְקָד־ <WH6485> 'ef-kod- Shall I not visit בָּ֖ם bam נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- them for these [things];saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD אִ֚ם <WH518> 'im On בְּג֣וֹי <WH1471> be-Goy on such a nation אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- such כָּזֶ֔ה <WH2088> ka-Zeh, this לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not תִתְנַקֵּ֖ם <WH5358> tit-nak-Kem be avenged נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> naf-Shi. shall not my soul ס sa-Mek

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- For הֶ֨הָרִ֜ים <WH2022> he-ha-Rim For the mountains אֶשָּׂ֧א <WH5375> 'es-Sa will I take up בְכִ֣י <WH1065> ve-Chi a weeping וָנֶ֗הִי <WH5092> va-Ne-hi, and wailing וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and for נְא֤וֹת <WH4999> ne-'ot and for the habitations מִדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> mid-Bar of the wilderness קִינָ֔ה <WH7015> ki-Nah, a lamentation כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki Because נִצְּתוּ֙ <WH3341> nitz-tze-Tu because they are burned up מִבְּלִי־ <WH1097> mib-be-li- no אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish so that none עֹבֵ֔ר <WH5674> 'o-Ver, can pass וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo is not שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> sha-me-'U through [them] neither can [men] hear ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice מִקְנֶ֑ה <WH4735> mik-Neh; of the cattle מֵע֤וֹף <WH5775> me-'of both the fowl הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim of the heavens וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against בְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> be-he-Mah, and the beast נָדְד֖וּ <WH5074> na-de-Du are fled הָלָֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> ha-La-chu. they are gone

וְנָתַתִּ֧י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem לְגַלִּ֖ים <WH1530> le-gal-Lim heaps מְע֣וֹן <WH4583> me-'on [and] a den תַּנִּ֑ים <WH8577> tan-Nim; of dragons וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עָרֵ֧י <WH5892> 'a-Rei the cities יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah אֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> 'et-Ten and I will make שְׁמָמָ֖ה <WH8077> she-ma-Mah desolate מִבְּלִ֖י <WH1097> mib-be-Li without יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> yo-Shev. without an inhabitant ס sa-Mek

מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- Who הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish man הֶֽחָכָם֙ <WH2450> he-cha-Cham Who [is] the wise וְיָבֵ֣ן <WH995> ve-ya-Ven that may understand אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זֹ֔את <WH2063> Zot, likewise וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath spoken פִּֽי־ <WH6310> pi- this;and [who is he] to whom the mouth יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> 'e-Lav about וְיַגִּדָ֑הּ <WH5046> ve-yag-gi-Dah; that he may declare עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and מָה֙ <WH4100> mah how long אָבְדָ֣ה <WH6> 'a-ve-Dah perisheth הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, it for what the land נִצְּתָ֥ה <WH3341> nitz-tze-Tah [and] is burned up כַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> cham-mid-Bar like a wilderness מִבְּלִ֖י <WH1097> mib-be-Li no עֹבֵֽר׃ <WH5674> 'o-Ver. that none passeth through ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, God עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- Because עָזְבָם֙ <WH5800> 'a-ze-Vam Because they have forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- תּ֣וֹרָתִ֔י <WH8451> to-ra-Ti, my law אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti which I set לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem; before וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor שָׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> sha-me-'U them and have not obeyed בְקוֹלִ֖י <WH6963> ve-ko-Li my voice וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor הָ֥לְכוּ <WH1980> Hal-chu neither walked בָֽהּ׃ Vah.

וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <WH1980> vai-Ye-le-Chu, have walked אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after שְׁרִר֣וּת <WH8307> she-ri-Rut the imagination לִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> lib-Bam; of their own heart וְאַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> ve-'a-cha-Rei and after הַבְּעָלִ֔ים <WH1168> hab-be-'a-Lim, Baalim אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after לִמְּד֖וּם <WH3925> lim-me-Dum taught אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> a-vo-Tam. which their fathers ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> tze-va-'Ot of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הִנְנִ֧י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold מַאֲכִילָ֛ם <WH398> ma-'a-chi-Lam Behold I will feed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> ha-'Am them [even] this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh this לַֽעֲנָ֑ה <WH3939> la-'a-Nah; with wormwood וְהִשְׁקִיתִ֖ים <WH8248> ve-hish-ki-Tim to drink מֵי־ <WH4325> mei- and give them water רֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7219> Rosh. of gall

וַהֲפִֽצוֹתִים֙ <WH6327> va-ha-fi-tzo-Tim I will scatter בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> bag-go-Yim, them also among the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher whom לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo neither יָֽדְע֔וּ <WH3045> ya-de-'U, have known הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah like וַֽאֲבוֹתָ֑ם <WH1> va-'a-vo-Tam; whom neither they nor their fathers וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֤י <WH7971> ve-shil-lach-Ti and I will send אַֽחֲרֵיהֶם֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem after אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> ha-Che-rev, a sword עַ֥ד <WH5704> 'ad until כַּלּוֹתִ֖י <WH3615> kal-lo-Ti them till I have consumed אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> o-Tam. פ Peh

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot, of hosts הִתְבּֽוֹנְנ֛וּ <WH995> hit-bon-Nu Consider וְקִרְא֥וּ <WH7121> ve-kir-'U ye and call לַמְקוֹנְנ֖וֹת <WH6969> lam-kon-Not for the mourning women וּתְבוֹאֶ֑ינָה <WH935> u-te-vo-'Ei-nah; that they may come וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- for הַחֲכָמ֥וֹת <WH2450> ha-cha-cha-Mot for cunning שִׁלְח֖וּ <WH7971> shil-Chu and send וְתָבֽוֹאנָה׃ <WH935> ve-ta-Vo-nah. [women] that they may come

וּתְמַהֵ֕רְנָה <WH4116> u-te-ma-He-re-nah And let them make haste וְתִשֶּׂ֥נָה <WH5375> ve-tis-Se-nah and take up עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu up נֶ֑הִי <WH5092> Ne-hi; a wailing וְתֵרַ֤דְנָה <WH3381> ve-te-Rad-nah may run down עֵינֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-nu for us that our eyes דִּמְעָ֔ה <WH1832> dim-'Ah, with tears וְעַפְעַפֵּ֖ינוּ <WH6079> ve-'af-'ap-Pei-nu and our eyelids יִזְּלוּ־ <WH5140> yiz-ze-lu- gush out מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> Ma-yim. with waters

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki Because ק֥וֹל <WH6963> Kol For a voice נְהִ֛י <WH5092> ne-Hi of wailing נִשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> nish-Ma' is heard מִצִּיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> mitz-tzi-Yon out of Zion אֵ֣יךְ <WH349> 'eich How שֻׁדָּ֑דְנוּ <WH7703> shud-Da-de-nu; How are we spoiled בֹּ֤שְׁנֽוּ <WH954> Bo-she-nu confounded מְאֹד֙ <WH3966> me-'Od we are greatly כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Because עָזַ֣בְנוּ <WH5800> 'a-Zav-nu because we have forsaken אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz, the land כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki Because הִשְׁלִ֖יכוּ <WH7993> hish-Li-chu have cast [us] out מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH4908> mish-ke-no-Tei-nu. because our dwellings ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Now שְׁמַ֤עְנָה <WH8085> she-Ma'-nah Yet hear נָשִׁים֙ <WH802> na-Shim O ye women דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וְתִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> ve-tik-Kach receive אָזְנְכֶ֖ם <WH241> 'a-ze-ne-Chem and let your ear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- the word פִּ֑יו <WH6310> Piv; of his mouth וְלַמֵּ֤דְנָה <WH3925> ve-lam-Me-de-nah and teach בְנֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1323> ve-no-tei-Chem your daughters נֶ֔הִי <WH5092> Ne-hi, wailing וְאִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> ve-'ish-Shah and every one רְעוּתָ֖הּ <WH7468> re-'u-Tah her neighbour קִינָֽה׃ <WH7015> ki-Nah. lamentation
